name: Lanturn
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: The light it emits is so bright that it can illuminate the sea’s surface from a depth of over three miles.

abilities.name: Hydroelectric Power
abilities.effect: You may make Floodlight do 10 more damage for each {W} Energy attached to Lanturn but not used to pay for Floodlight’s Energy cost. This power can’t be used if Lanturn is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Floodlight
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
